MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH43 postcode area of Prenton, affecting properties in Woodchurch Road, Holmlands Drive, and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:14 am. Our engineers are on site completing network checks, following recent faults. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12:00 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  10:23 am on 24th February, 2021.
